name: Bereaved (Games Academy)
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Bereaved 

As the Lizardmen razed your people’s village, you gave yourself to the mysterious mask to take revenge on the leader of the assault. Deal with his kin as they dealt with yours.

Bereaved features:

- A 2D action platformer

- Metroidvania-styled environment

- Pixelart Look

- For PC, played with controller

- Made with the Unity Engine
